Welcome to the School Management System

This system allows teachers to perform CRUD operations on student records. They can add new records, edit existing records, delete records, and even upload student images.

With the help of PHP for backend processing and the Bootstrap framework for frontend design, this system provides a user-friendly interface for managing student information.

Teachers can easily navigate through the system using the navigation bar at the top. The "Add Record" link allows them to add a new student record by providing necessary details such as name, class, and photo. The "View Records" link allows them to view all the student records in a tabular format and perform various operations like editing or deleting specific records.

By leveraging the power of PHP and Bootstrap, this school management system simplifies the administrative tasks of maintaining student records, making it more efficient and organized.

Start using the system now and experience the convenience it brings to school management!
